name: A NSMB-bomb-minigame remake (sourcecode, Godot)
description:
Install instructions

A quite unfinished prototype

In order to launch the game, you need to download both .exe and .pck files. 

The Godot project directory is available in .zip. There may be some hacky fixes and bad habits, so this shouldn't be an example at all ;)

(And there's no game menu, contrary to one of the game-over-screen label)
